feature.label: KNIME4NGS
feature.description: Knime4NGS is a set of custom KNIME nodes, designed for processing large next generation sequencing datasets. The nodes wrap functionalities of popular command line tools like BWA, Samtools and GATK and allow an easy creation of comprehensive NGS KNIME workflows.
